import axios from "axios" import React, { useState } from "react" import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" import './u-reg.css' function Register() { const navigate = useNavigate() let initialstate = { name:"", age:"", email:"", password:"", verifyPassword:"", mobile:"" } const [form , setform] = useState(initialstate) const submit = (e) => { if(form.verifyPassword !== form.password) { return alert("password not match") } e.preventDefault() console.log(form) axios .post("http://localhost:7000/reg" ,form) .then((res) => { console.log("backend",res.data) alert("Register Successfully") navigate('/login') }) .catch((err) => { console.log(`error:${err}`) }) setform(initialstate) } return(

Register

setform({...form , name: e.target.value})}/>

setform({...form , age: e.target.value})}/>

setform({...form, email: e.target.value})}/>

setform({...form, password: e.target.value})}/>

setform({...form ,verifyPassword: e.target.value})}/>

setform({...form ,mobile: e.target.value})}/>

) } export default Register
